analyzed: gzhan yang de lta bu gang yin pa gnas mal 'bog par bsko bar bya'o //
translated: or anyone else like him to prepare the beds and seats.”

original: gnas mal 'bog pa chos lnga dang ldan pa ni /
analyzed: gnas mal 'bog pa chos lnga dang ldan pa ni /
translated: One who assigns bedding and seats should have five qualities.

original: ma bskos pa yang bsko bar mi bya la /
analyzed: ma bskos pa yang bsko bar mi bya la /
translated: One who does not have these qualities should not be appointed,

original: bskos pa yang dbyung bar bya ste /
analyzed: bskos pa yang dbyung bar bya ste /
translated: and one who has them should be dismissed.

original: lnga gang zhe na 'dun pas 'gro ba dang / zhe sdang gis 'gro ba dang / gti mug gis 'gro ba dang / 'jigs pas 'gro ba dang / gnas mal @378b phog pa dang ma phog pa mi shes pa'o //
analyzed: lnga gang zhe na 'dun pas 'gro ba dang / zhe sdang gis 'gro ba dang / gti mug gis 'gro ba dang / 'jigs pas 'gro ba dang / gnas mal @378b phog pa dang ma phog pa mi shes pa'o //
translated: What are the five? Going out of desire, going out of hatred, going out of confusion, going out of fear, and not knowing whether bedding and seats have been assigned or not.

original: gnas mal 'bog pa chos lnga dang ldan pa ni /
analyzed: gnas mal 'bog pa chos lnga dang ldan pa ni /
translated: One who assigns bedding and seats should have five qualities.

original: ma bskos pa yang bsko bar bya /
analyzed: ma bskos pa yang bsko bar bya /
translated: One who does not have these qualities should be appointed,

original: bskos pa yang dbyung bar mi bya ste /
analyzed: bskos pa yang dbyung bar mi bya ste /
translated: and one who has them should not be dismissed.

original: lnga gang zhe na /
analyzed: lnga gang zhe na /
translated: What are the five?

original: 'dun pas mi 'gro ba dang / zhe sdang gis mi 'gro ba dang / gti mug gis mi 'gro ba dang / 'jigs pas mi 'gro ba dang / gnas mal phog pa dang ma phog pa shes pa'o //
analyzed: 'dun pas mi 'gro ba dang / zhe sdang gis mi 'gro ba dang / gti mug gis mi 'gro ba dang / 'jigs pas mi 'gro ba dang / gnas mal phog pa dang ma phog pa shes pa'o //
translated: Not going out of desire, not going out of hatred, not going out of confusion, not going out of fear, and knowing whether bedding and seats have been assigned or not.

original: 'di ltar bsko bar bya ste /
analyzed: 'di ltar bsko bar bya ste /
translated: This is how one should be appointed:

original: gnas mal bsham par byas nas gand'i brdungs te dris pa'i tshig gis dge slong rnams la bskul nas dge 'dun thams cad 'dug cing mthun par gyur pa la je dang por spro bar bya ste /
analyzed: gnas mal bsham par byas nas gand'i brdungs te dris pa'i tshig gis dge slong rnams la bskul nas dge 'dun thams cad 'dug cing mthun par gyur pa la je dang por spro bar bya ste /
translated: Having prepared the sleeping place, having struck the gandi, having exhorted the monks with the question, when the whole Saṅgha is present and has assented, he should first encourage them.

original: ming 'di zhes bya ba khyod dge 'dun la gnas mal 'bog par spro'am /
analyzed: ming 'di zhes bya ba khyod dge 'dun la gnas mal 'bog par spro'am /
translated: “Are you, named so-and-so, able to distribute the sleeping places to the Saṅgha?”

original: gal te spro na des spro'o zhes brjod par bya'o //
analyzed: gal te spro na des spro'o zhes brjod par bya'o //
translated: If he is able, he should say, “I am able.”

original: de'i 'og tu dge slong gcig gis gsol ba byas te las bya'o //
analyzed: de'i 'og tu dge slong gcig gis gsol ba byas te las bya'o //
translated: After that, one monk should make a proposal and do the action.

original: dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol /🔽dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di dge 'dun la gnas mal 'bog par spro na /
analyzed: dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol / dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di dge 'dun la gnas mal 'bog par spro na /
translated: “O Noble Saṅgha, please listen!🔽This monk named so-and-so is able to distribute the sleeping places to the Saṅgha.

original: gal te dge 'dun gyis dus la bab cing bzod na dge 'dun gyis gnang bar mdzod cig dang / dge 'dun gyis dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di dge 'dun la gnas mal 'bog par bsko bar bgyi ste /
analyzed: gal te dge 'dun gyis dus la bab cing bzod na dge 'dun gyis gnang bar mdzod cig dang / dge 'dun gyis dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di dge 'dun la gnas mal 'bog par bsko bar bgyi ste /
translated: If the time has come for the Saṅgha and it is agreeable, the Saṅgha should assent that the Saṅgha appoint this monk named so-and-so to distribute the sleeping places to the Saṅgha.

original: dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di dge 'dun la gnas mal 'bog go /
analyzed: dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di dge 'dun la gnas mal 'bog go /
translated: This monk so-and-so is willing to distribute bedding to the saṅgha.

original: 'di ni gsol ba'o //
analyzed: 'di ni gsol ba'o //
translated: This is the motion.

original: las ni 'di ltar bya ste /
analyzed: las ni 'di ltar bya ste /
translated: The action is as follows:

original: dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol /
analyzed: dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol /
translated: “Virtuous saṅgha, please listen!

original: dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di dge 'dun la gnas mal 'bog par spro ste /
analyzed: dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di dge 'dun la gnas mal 'bog par spro ste /
translated: This monk so-and-so is willing to distribute bedding to the saṅgha.

original: de'i slad du dge @379a *//
analyzed: de'i slad du dge @379a *//
translated: For that purpose,

original: 'dun gyis dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba dge 'dun la gnas mal 'bog par bsko na /
analyzed: 'dun gyis dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba dge 'dun la gnas mal 'bog par bsko na /
translated: if the saṅgha appoints the monk so-and-so to distribute bedding to the saṅgha,

original: tshe dang ldan pa gang dag dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di dge 'dun la gnas mal 'bog par bsko bar bzod pa de dag ni cang ma gsungs shig /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa gang dag dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di dge 'dun la gnas mal 'bog par bsko bar bzod pa de dag ni cang ma gsungs shig /
translated: those venerable ones who agree to appoint the monk so-and-so to distribute bedding to the saṅgha should remain silent.

original: gang dag mi bzod pa de dag ni gsungs shig /
analyzed: gang dag mi bzod pa de dag ni gsungs shig /
translated: Those who do not agree should speak.

original: dge 'dun gyis bzod cing gnang nas dge 'dun gyis dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di dge 'dun la gnas mal 'bog par bskos lags te /
analyzed: dge 'dun gyis bzod cing gnang nas dge 'dun gyis dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di dge 'dun la gnas mal 'bog par bskos lags te /
translated: The saṅgha has agreed and consented to appoint the monk so-and-so to distribute bedding to the saṅgha.

original: 'di ltar cang mi gsung bas de de bzhin du 'dzin to //
analyzed: 'di ltar cang mi gsung bas de de bzhin du 'dzin to //
translated: Since there are no objections, this is how it will be upheld.”

original: gang gi tshe tshe dang ldan pa gyad bu nor gnas mal 'bog par bskos pa de'i tshe na des gnas mal de dag mthun par rnam par bzhag ste /
analyzed: gang gi tshe tshe dang ldan pa gyad bu nor gnas mal 'bog par bskos pa de'i tshe na des gnas mal de dag mthun par rnam par bzhag ste /
translated: When the venerable Jīvaka was appointed to assign the sleeping quarters, he assigned them in a way that was agreeable to everyone.

original: mdo sde 'dzin pa rnams kyang mdo sde 'dzin pa rnams dang lhan cig rnam par bzhag /
analyzed: mdo sde 'dzin pa rnams kyang mdo sde 'dzin pa rnams dang lhan cig rnam par bzhag /
translated: Those who upheld the sūtras were assigned to the same place as those who upheld the sūtras.

original: 'dul ba 'dzin pa rnams kyang 'dul ba 'dzin pa rnams dang / ma mo 'dzin pa rnams kyang ma mo 'dzin pa rnams dang / chos sgrog pa rnams kyang chos sgrog pa rnams dang / spong ba pa rnams kyang spong ba pa rnams dang lhan cig rnam par bzhag go /
analyzed: 'dul ba 'dzin pa rnams kyang 'dul ba 'dzin pa rnams dang / ma mo 'dzin pa rnams kyang ma mo 'dzin pa rnams dang / chos sgrog pa rnams kyang chos sgrog pa rnams dang / spong ba pa rnams kyang spong ba pa rnams dang lhan cig rnam par bzhag go /
translated: Those who upheld the vinaya were assigned to the same place as those who upheld the vinaya. Those who upheld the mātṛkā were assigned to the same place as those who upheld the mātṛkā. Those who taught the Dharma were assigned to the same place as those who taught the Dharma. Those who practiced meditation were assigned to the same place as those who practiced meditation.

original: de dag gnas mal mthun par phog pas phan tshun gtam dang / 'bel ba'i gtam gyis rnam par gtan la 'bebs pas dge ba'i chos rnams kyis rnam par 'phel te /
analyzed: de dag gnas mal mthun par phog pas phan tshun gtam dang / 'bel ba'i gtam gyis rnam par gtan la 'bebs pas dge ba'i chos rnams kyis rnam par 'phel te /
translated: Since they were assigned to the same sleeping quarters, they discussed and debated with each other. Since they were able to resolve their doubts, they increased in virtuous qualities.

original: dper na chu nas autpal bzhin no //
analyzed: dper na chu nas autpal bzhin no //
translated: They were like lotuses in the water.

original: de na gang dag mtshan mo 'ong ba de dag la ni tshe dang ldan pa gyad bu nor gyis rdzu 'phrul gyis sor mo gcig las 'od sbar te gnas @379b mal 'bog par byed do //
analyzed: de na gang dag mtshan mo 'ong ba de dag la ni tshe dang ldan pa gyad bu nor gyis rdzu 'phrul gyis sor mo gcig las 'od sbar te gnas @379b mal 'bog par byed do //
translated: Those who arrived at night, Venerable Yaśaḥprabha would light a finger with his magical power and distribute the bedding.

original: de na gang dag mtshan mo ches 'phyi ba na 'ong ba de dag la ni tshe dang ldan pa gyad bu nor gyis rdzu 'phrul gyis sor mo gnyis las 'od spar te gnas mal 'bog par byed do //
analyzed: de na gang dag mtshan mo ches 'phyi ba na 'ong ba de dag la ni tshe dang ldan pa gyad bu nor gyis rdzu 'phrul gyis sor mo gnyis las 'od spar te gnas mal 'bog par byed do //
translated: Those who arrived very late at night, Venerable Yaśaḥprabha would light two fingers with his magical power and distribute the bedding.

original: de na dge slong gang dag tshe dang ldan pa gyad bu nor gyis mi'i chos bla ma rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul lta bar 'dod pa de dag ni ched du bsams te /
analyzed: de na dge slong gang dag tshe dang ldan pa gyad bu nor gyis mi'i chos bla ma rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul lta bar 'dod pa de dag ni ched du bsams te /
translated: Those monks who wished to see the higher human magical power of Venerable Yaśaḥprabha would intentionally

original: mtshan mo 'ong bar byed pas /🔽de dag la tshe dang ldan pa gyad bu nor gyis rdzu 'phrul gyis sor mo lnga char las 'od spar te /
analyzed: mtshan mo 'ong bar byed pas / de dag la tshe dang ldan pa gyad bu nor gyis rdzu 'phrul gyis sor mo lnga char las 'od spar te /
translated: arrive at night.

original: gnas mal 'bog par byed do //
analyzed: gnas mal 'bog par byed do //
translated: For them, Venerable Yaśaḥprabha would light all five fingers with his magical power and distribute the bedding.

original: de dag 'di snyam du sems te /
analyzed: de dag 'di snyam du sems te /
translated: They thought,

original: bdag cag gis ston pa dang 'dra ba'i nyan thos chen po 'di lta bus gnas mal phog pa la glos phab ste /
analyzed: bdag cag gis ston pa dang 'dra ba'i nyan thos chen po 'di lta bus gnas mal phog pa la glos phab ste /
translated: “We have been careless in assigning sleeping quarters to such great disciples who are like our Teacher.🔽

original: gnyid log par byed pa ni bdag cag gi tshul dang mthun pa ma yin gyis /
analyzed: gnyid log par byed pa ni bdag cag gi tshul dang mthun pa ma yin gyis /
translated: “It is not right for us to sleep while the great disciples, who are like our teacher, are distributing the bedding.

original: bdag cag gis nam gyi cha stod dang nam gyi cha smad la mi nyal bar sbyor ba'i rjes su brtson par gnas par bya'o snyam nas /🔽de dag nam gyi cha stod dang nam gyi cha smad la mi nyal bar sbyor ba'i rjes su brtson par gnas pas ma thob pa ni thob par gyur cing /
analyzed: bdag cag gis nam gyi cha stod dang nam gyi cha smad la mi nyal bar sbyor ba'i rjes su brtson par gnas par bya'o snyam nas / de dag nam gyi cha stod dang nam gyi cha smad la mi nyal bar sbyor ba'i rjes su brtson par gnas pas ma thob pa ni thob par gyur cing /
translated: We should stay awake and apply ourselves to spiritual practice during the first and last periods of the night.”🔽They did so, and those who had not attained their goals did so,

original: thob pa las ni yongs su mi nyams par gyur to //
analyzed: thob pa las ni yongs su mi nyams par gyur to //
translated: while those who had attained their goals did not regress.

original: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa /
translated: Then the Blessed One said to the monks,

original: dge slong dag nga'i nyan thos kyi dge slong gnas mal 'bog pa rnams kyi nang na 'di lta ste nga'i gyad bu nor 'di mchog yin no //
analyzed: dge slong dag nga'i nyan thos kyi dge slong gnas mal 'bog pa rnams kyi nang na 'di lta ste nga'i gyad bu nor 'di mchog yin no //
translated: “Monks, among my monks who distribute the bedding, the foremost is this, my disciple Girika.”

original: gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis bstan pa rgyas par gyur pa de'i tshe bram ze dang khyim bdag dad pa rnams kyis khyim dag tu dge @380a *//
analyzed: gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis bstan pa rgyas par gyur pa de'i tshe bram ze dang khyim bdag dad pa rnams kyis khyim dag tu dge @380a *//
translated: When the teachings of the Blessed One had spread, the faithful brahmins and householders offered homes to the monks.

original: 'dun gyi zas dag bshams pa na /
analyzed: 'dun gyi zas dag bshams pa na /
translated: When the Blessed One’s teachings had spread, brahmins and householders with faith prepared meals for the saṅgha in their homes.

original: drug sde dag gang na zas dag bsod pa der dong ste /
analyzed: drug sde dag gang na zas dag bsod pa der dong ste /
translated: The group of six went to where the food was good🔽and enjoyed it.

original: yongs su longs spyod par byed nas bram ze dang / khyim bdag dad pa de dag gis smras pa /
analyzed: yongs su longs spyod par byed nas bram ze dang / khyim bdag dad pa de dag gis smras pa /
translated: The brahmins and householders with faith said,

original: 'phags pa dag khyed cag 'ba' zhig gdugs gcig bzhin du byon na ci'i slad du dge slong gnas brtan gnas brtan de dag ma byon /
analyzed: 'phags pa dag khyed cag 'ba' zhig gdugs gcig bzhin du byon na ci'i slad du dge slong gnas brtan gnas brtan de dag ma byon /
translated: “Noble ones, if only you come every day, why don’t the elder monks come?”

original: drug sde dag gis smras pa /
analyzed: drug sde dag gis smras pa /
translated: The group of six said,🔽🔽

original: de dag zas 'di lta bu dag la yongs su longs spyod par mi byed do //
analyzed: de dag zas 'di lta bu dag la yongs su longs spyod par mi byed do //
translated: They don’t enjoy such food.”🔽“🔽Well, what do they enjoy?”

original: 'o na ji lta bu dag la yongs su longs spyod par mdzad /
analyzed: 'o na ji lta bu dag la yongs su longs spyod par mdzad /
translated: How does he enjoy them?🔽

original: bsod pa dag la'o //
analyzed: bsod pa dag la'o //
translated: Good food.”🔽“

original: 'phags pa dag bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag cag bsod pa sbyin par byed pa rnams kyis mchog tu bstan na /
analyzed: 'phags pa dag bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag cag bsod pa sbyin par byed pa rnams kyis mchog tu bstan na /
translated: Noble ones, the Blessed One has taught that we who give good food are the best.

original: khyed cag ci'i slad du de skad ces de dag zas 'di lta bu dag la yongs su longs spyod par mi byed do zhes gsung /
analyzed: khyed cag ci'i slad du de skad ces de dag zas 'di lta bu dag la yongs su longs spyod par mi byed do zhes gsung /
translated: Why do you say, ‘Why don’t you enjoy such food?’”

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis 'phags pa'i rigs kyi mdo las chos gos gang yang rung bas chog shes pa 'phags pa'i rigs dang / bsod snyoms gang yang rung bas chog shes pa 'phags pa'i rigs dang / gnas mal gang yang rung bas chog shes pa 'phags pa'i rigs dang /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis 'phags pa'i rigs kyi mdo las chos gos gang yang rung bas chog shes pa 'phags pa'i rigs dang / bsod snyoms gang yang rung bas chog shes pa 'phags pa'i rigs dang / gnas mal gang yang rung bas chog shes pa 'phags pa'i rigs dang /
translated: The Blessed One said in the Discourse on the Noble Traditions, “Being content with any robe is a noble tradition, being content with any almsfood is a noble tradition, being content with any bed and seat is a noble tradition,

original: spong ba la mngon par dga' ba dang / sgom pa la mngon par dga' ba 'phags pa'i rigs zhes gsungs na /
analyzed: spong ba la mngon par dga' ba dang / sgom pa la mngon par dga' ba 'phags pa'i rigs zhes gsungs na /
translated: being devoted to meditation and being devoted to concentration are noble traditions.”

original: khyed cag legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu byung nas ci'i slad du byung rgyal du smra bar mdzad /
analyzed: khyed cag legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu byung nas ci'i slad du byung rgyal du smra bar mdzad /
translated: “Since you have gone forth in the well-proclaimed Dharma and Vinaya, why do you speak so much nonsense?”

original: bzhud la slan chad 'dir ma byon cig /
analyzed: bzhud la slan chad 'dir ma byon cig /
translated: “Go away! Don’t come here again!”

original: drug sde dag spobs pa med par @380b gyur nas cang mi smra bar dong ngo //
analyzed: drug sde dag spobs pa med par @380b gyur nas cang mi smra bar dong ngo //
translated: The group of six had no reply. They left in silence.

original: thos pa gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pas dge slong dag gis thos nas dge slong dag gis skabs de bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /🔽dge slong dag khyed kyis dge slong gyad bu nor ram /
analyzed: thos pa gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pas dge slong dag gis thos nas dge slong dag gis skabs de bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa / dge slong dag khyed kyis dge slong gyad bu nor ram /
translated: The Blessed One said,

original: gzhan yang de lta bu gang yin pa zas las sko bar bsgo bar bya'o //
analyzed: gzhan yang de lta bu gang yin pa zas las sko bar bsgo bar bya'o //
translated: “Monks, you should appoint the monk Kaulita or anyone else like him to distribute the food.

original: zas la sko ba chos lnga dang ldan pa ni ma bskos pa yang bsko bar mi bya la /
analyzed: zas la sko ba chos lnga dang ldan pa ni ma bskos pa yang bsko bar mi bya la /
translated: “Monks, one who distributes the food should not appoint someone who has five qualities to distribute the food,

original: bskos pa yang dbyung bar bya ste /
analyzed: bskos pa yang dbyung bar bya ste /
translated: and if he has been appointed, he should be removed.

original: lnga gang zhe na /
analyzed: lnga gang zhe na /
translated: What are the five?

original: 'dun pas 'gro ba dang / zhe sdang gis 'gro ba dang / gti mug gis 'gro ba dang / 'jigs pas 'gro ba dang / zas la bskos pa dang ma bskos pa mi shes pa'o //
analyzed: 'dun pas 'gro ba dang / zhe sdang gis 'gro ba dang / gti mug gis 'gro ba dang / 'jigs pas 'gro ba dang / zas la bskos pa dang ma bskos pa mi shes pa'o //
translated: He goes out of desire, he goes out of hatred, he goes out of ignorance, he goes out of fear, and he does not know who has been appointed and who has not been appointed to distribute the food.

original: zas la sko ba chos lnga dang ldan pa ni ma bskos pa yang bsko bar bya la /
analyzed: zas la sko ba chos lnga dang ldan pa ni ma bskos pa yang bsko bar bya la /
translated: “Monks, one who distributes the food should appoint someone who has five qualities to distribute the food,

original: bskos pa yang dbyung bar mi bya ste /
analyzed: bskos pa yang dbyung bar mi bya ste /
translated: and if he has not been appointed, he should be appointed.

original: lnga gang zhe na /
analyzed: lnga gang zhe na /
translated: What are the five?

original: 'dun pas mi 'gro ba dang / zhe sdang gis mi 'gro ba dang / gti mug gis mi 'gro ba dang / 'jigs pas mi 'gro ba dang / zas la bskos pa dang ma bskos pa shes pa'o //
analyzed: 'dun pas mi 'gro ba dang / zhe sdang gis mi 'gro ba dang / gti mug gis mi 'gro ba dang / 'jigs pas mi 'gro ba dang / zas la bskos pa dang ma bskos pa shes pa'o //
translated: He should not go out of desire, nor out of hatred, nor out of delusion, nor out of fear. He should know what is assigned and what is not assigned.

original: 'di ltar bsko bar bya ste /
analyzed: 'di ltar bsko bar bya ste /
translated: This is how he should be appointed.

original: gnas mal bsham pa byas nas gand'i brdungs te dris pa'i tshig gis dge slong rnams la bskul nas /
analyzed: gnas mal bsham pa byas nas gand'i brdungs te dris pa'i tshig gis dge slong rnams la bskul nas /
translated: After arranging the seats, ringing the gong, and summoning the monks with the proclamation,

original: dge 'dun thams cad 'dug cing mthun par gyur pa la je dang por spro bar bya ste /
analyzed: dge 'dun thams cad 'dug cing mthun par gyur pa la je dang por spro bar bya ste /
translated: when the whole Saṅgha has gathered and there is consent, he should first be encouraged:

original: ming 'di zhes bya ba khyod dge slong rnams la zas la bsko bar spro'am /
analyzed: ming 'di zhes bya ba khyod dge slong rnams la zas la bsko bar spro'am /
translated: “Are you, so-and-so, able to assign meals to the monks?”

original: gal te spro na des spro'o zhes brjod par bya'o //
analyzed: gal te spro na des spro'o zhes brjod par bya'o //
translated: If he is able, he should say, “I am able.”

original: de'i 'og tu dge slong gcig gis gsol ba byas te las bya'o //
analyzed: de'i 'og tu dge slong gcig gis gsol ba byas te las bya'o //
translated: After that, one monk should make a proposal to do a legal procedure.

original: dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol /
analyzed: dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol /
translated: “Venerables, please listen!

original: @381a *// dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di dge slong rnams la zas la sko bar spro na /
analyzed: @381a *// dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di dge slong rnams la zas la sko bar spro na /
translated: This monk so-and-so is able to assign meals to the monks.

original: gal te dge 'dun gyis dus la bab cing bzod na dge 'dun gyis gnang bar mdzod cig dang / dge 'dun gyis dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di dge slong rnams la zas la sko bar bsko bar bgyi ste /
analyzed: gal te dge 'dun gyis dus la bab cing bzod na dge 'dun gyis gnang bar mdzod cig dang / dge 'dun gyis dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di dge slong rnams la zas la sko bar bsko bar bgyi ste /
translated: If the time is right for the Saṅgha and you accept it, the Saṅgha should agree.🔽The Saṅgha is appointing the monk so-and-so as the one to distribute food to the monks.

original: dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di dge slong rnams la zas la bsko'o //
analyzed: dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di dge slong rnams la zas la bsko'o //
translated: The monk so-and-so is the one to distribute food to the monks.

original: 'di ni gsol ba'o //
analyzed: 'di ni gsol ba'o //
translated: This is the motion.

original: las ni 'di ltar bya ste /
analyzed: las ni 'di ltar bya ste /
translated: The action is this:

original: dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol /🔽dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di dge slong rnams la zas la bsko bar spro ste /
analyzed: dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol / dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di dge slong rnams la zas la bsko bar spro ste /
translated: “Venerables, please listen!🔽The monk so-and-so is willing to be the one to distribute food to the monks.

original: de'i slad du dge 'dun gyis dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba dge slong rnams la zas la bsko bar bsko na /
analyzed: de'i slad du dge 'dun gyis dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba dge slong rnams la zas la bsko bar bsko na /
translated: If the time is right for the Saṅgha, the Saṅgha will appoint the monk so-and-so as the one to distribute food to the monks.

original: tshe dang ldan pa gang dag dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba dge slong rnams la zas la sko bar bsko bar bzod pa de dag ni cang ma gsungs shig /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa gang dag dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba dge slong rnams la zas la sko bar bsko bar bzod pa de dag ni cang ma gsungs shig /
translated: Those who approve of appointing the monk so-and-so as the one to distribute food to the monks should remain silent.

original: gang dag mi bzod pa de dag ni gsungs shig /
analyzed: gang dag mi bzod pa de dag ni gsungs shig /
translated: Let those who are in favor of appointing the monk so-and-so as the monk who distributes food to the saṅgha remain silent.

original: dge 'dun gyis bzod cing gnang nas dge 'dun gyis dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba dge slong rnams la zas la sko bar bskos lags te /
analyzed: dge 'dun gyis bzod cing gnang nas dge 'dun gyis dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba dge slong rnams la zas la sko bar bskos lags te /
translated: Since the saṅgha has consented and agreed, the saṅgha has appointed the monk so-and-so as the monk who distributes food to the saṅgha.

original: 'di ltar cang mi gsung bas de de bzhin du 'dzin to //
analyzed: 'di ltar cang mi gsung bas de de bzhin du 'dzin to //
translated: Since there are no objections, this is my considered view.

original: gang gi tshe tshe dang ldan pa gyad bu nor zas la sko bar bskos pa de'i tshe na des dge 'dun la zas rnam pa gsum bshams te /
analyzed: gang gi tshe tshe dang ldan pa gyad bu nor zas la sko bar bskos pa de'i tshe na des dge 'dun la zas rnam pa gsum bshams te /
translated: When the venerable Jīvaka was appointed to distribute food, he prepared three kinds of food for the saṅgha:

original: bsod pa dag dang / 'bring dag dang / ngan pa dag go /
analyzed: bsod pa dag dang / 'bring dag dang / ngan pa dag go /
translated: good, middling, and bad.

original: dge slong gang dag glo bur du lhags pa de dag la ni nyi ma dang po la ni zas bsod pa dag tu sko bar byed /
analyzed: dge slong gang dag glo bur du lhags pa de dag la ni nyi ma dang po la ni zas bsod pa dag tu sko bar byed /
translated: He appointed the newly arrived monks to the good food on the first day,

original: nyi ma @381b gnyis pa ni 'bring du /
analyzed: nyi ma @381b gnyis pa ni 'bring du /
translated: the middling on the second day,

original: gsum pa la ni ngan par sko bar byed do //
analyzed: gsum pa la ni ngan par sko bar byed do //
translated: and the bad on the third day.

original: nyi ma bzhi pa la ni de dag rang gi spyod yul shes pas bsod snyoms la 'jug par byed do //
analyzed: nyi ma bzhi pa la ni de dag rang gi spyod yul shes pas bsod snyoms la 'jug par byed do //
translated: On the fourth day, they went on their alms round, knowing the territory well.

original: de'i tshe na tshe dang ldan pa gyad bu nor rgyal po'i khab na gnas pa dang / gnyug mar gnas pa dang / gsol ba byed pa dang / gtams pa 'dzin pa dang / gnas mal 'bog pa dang / zas la sko bar byed pas de dge 'dun la lugs ji lta ba bzhin dang /
analyzed: de'i tshe na tshe dang ldan pa gyad bu nor rgyal po'i khab na gnas pa dang / gnyug mar gnas pa dang / gsol ba byed pa dang / gtams pa 'dzin pa dang / gnas mal 'bog pa dang / zas la sko bar byed pas de dge 'dun la lugs ji lta ba bzhin dang /
translated: At that time, the venerable Jīvaka Komārabhacca was the one who assigned seats to the Saṅgha in accordance with the rules,

original: rgan rims ji lta ba bzhin dang / go rims ji lta ba bzhin dang / thod rgal med par zas la sko bar byed do //
analyzed: rgan rims ji lta ba bzhin dang / go rims ji lta ba bzhin dang / thod rgal med par zas la sko bar byed do //
translated: in accordance with seniority, in accordance with the order, and without skipping anyone.
